==Official release==
==Official release==
â
A limited beta began on June 23, open only to 75,000 US, Israel & Brazil customers, with a Chinese beta opening in mid July, however, only one day later, (June 24, 2009), the downloads are no longer accessible, and the website displays a message saying "We are not accepting additional participants at this time"<ref>http://www.microsoft.com/security_essentials/</ref>. However, they are available still available from third-party websites<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Microsoft_Security_Essentials</ref>.
+
A limited beta began on June 23, open only to 75,000 US, Israel & Brazil customers, with a Chinese beta opening in mid July, however, only one day later, (June 24, 2009), the downloads are no longer accessible, and the website displays a message saying "We are not accepting additional participants at this time"<ref>http://www.microsoft.com/security_essentials/</ref>. However, they are still available from third-party websites<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Microsoft_Security_Essentials</ref>.
A final release expected no later than September.<ref>http://www.neowin.net/news/main/09/06/18/microsoft-set-to-beta-microsoft-security-essentials-june-23></ref>
A final release expected no later than September.<ref>http://www.neowin.net/news/main/09/06/18/microsoft-set-to-beta-microsoft-security-essentials-june-23></ref>
